titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 114) to authorize the use of United States Armed Forces against Iraq.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-724, by Mr. Dreier.
The amendment to the preamble and the amendment to the text recommended by the Committee on International Relations and now printed in the joint resolution shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 225.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 574.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/8/2002--Passed House without amendment. Provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 114 (authorization for the use of the armed forces against Iraq).
